This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Transfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`."},"TrustedForwarderUpdated(address,address)":{"details":"Used for meta-transaction support and gasless transactions","params":{"newForwarder":"Address of the new trusted forwarder","previousForwarder":"Address of the previous trusted forwarder"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Gives permission to `to` to transfer `tokenId` token to another account. The approval is cleared when the token is transferred. Only a single account can be approved at a time, so approving the zero address clears previous approvals. Requirements: - The caller must own the token or be an approved operator. - `tokenId` must exist. Emits an {Approval} event."},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"Returns the number of tokens in ``owner``'s account."},"burn(address,uint256)":{"custom:security":"Validates ownership and token existence before burning","details":"Only callable by BURNER_ROLE. Decrements total supply","params":{"_from":"Current owner address of the NFT","_id":"Token ID to burn"}},"disableNFT(uint256)":{"custom:security":"Used for compliance or security concerns","details":"Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE. NFT remains owned but non-transferable","params":{"_id":"Token ID to disable"}},"enableNFT(uint256)":{"custom:security":"Allows restoration of NFT after issues are resolved","details":"Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE. Restores full NFT functionality","params":{"_id":"Token ID to enable"}},"getApproved(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the account approved for `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist."},"getNFTData(uint256)":{"custom:view-function":"Pure read operation with no state changes","details":"Reverts with NonexistentToken if tokenID does not exist","params":{"_tokenID":"Token ID to query metadata for"},"returns":{"_0":"YLD_Metadata struct containing all token data"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {AccessControl-_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. See {setApprovalForAll}"},"mint(address,(uint256,string,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256),bytes,bool))":{"custom:security":"Validates recipient address and metadata integrity","details":"Only callable by MINTER_ROLE. Increments total supply","params":{"_metadata":"Complete metadata structure for the NFT","_to":"Recipient address for the new NFT"},"returns":{"_0":"Token ID of the newly minted NFT"}},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the owner of the `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist."},"pause()":{"custom:security":"Emergency function to halt all operations","details":"Only callable by PAUSER_ROLE. Prevents transfers, minting, and burning"},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`, checking first that contract recipients are aware of the ERC-721 protocol to prevent tokens from being forever locked. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must have been allowed to move this token by either {approve} or   {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {transferFrom} or {safeTransferFrom} for any token owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the address zero. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event."},"setBaseURI(string)":{"details":"Changes the base URI used for constructing token metadata URLsOnly callable by addresses with DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE","params":{"_uri":"The new base URI to set for token metadata"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. WARNING: Note that the caller is responsible to confirm that the recipient is capable of receiving ERC-721 or else they may be permanently lost. Usage of {safeTransferFrom} prevents loss, though the caller must understand this adds an external call which potentially creates a reentrancy vulnerability. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"unpause()":{"custom:security":"Should only be called after emergency conditions are resolved","details":"Only callable by PAUSER_ROLE. Restores normal operations after pause"}},"title":"iSTBL_YLD Interface","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"BurnEvent(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an NFT is permanently burned"},"ContractUpgraded(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the contract implementation is upgraded"},"MintEvent(address,uint256,(uint256,string,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256),bytes,bool))":{"notice":"Emitted when a new NFT is minted"},"NFTDisabled(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an NFT is disabled"},"NFTEnabled(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a disabled NFT is re-enabled"},"TrustedForwarderUpdated(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the trusted forwarder address is updated"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"burn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Permanently destroys an existing NFT"},"disableNFT(uint256)":{"notice":"Disables an NFT, preventing transfers and usage"},"enableNFT(uint256)":{"notice":"Re-enables a previously disabled NFT"},"getNFTData(uint256)":{"notice":"Retrieves complete metadata for a specific NFT"},"mint(address,(uint256,string,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256),bytes,bool))":{"notice":"Creates a new NFT with specified metadata"},"pause()":{"notice":"Pauses all contract functionality"},"setBaseURI(string)":{"notice":"Updates the base URI for token metadata"},"unpause()":{"notice":"Resumes all contract functionality"}},"notice":"Interface for the STBL YLD contract that manages yield-generating NFT tokens with lifecycle controls","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/ISTBL_YLD.sol":"iSTBL_YLD"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/"]},"sources":{"src/IAccessControl.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb869e93f092c8bcf52f82185a377261dbd93d1d8968778bdc7682a7e6c738a4c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1fdf1ff54ebab1fbcb7a4dbe8988475dd5408ca92ba078abe16b200774c03f93","dweb:/ipfs/QmTGvJ8P3fLLpg2QaWD9Rt2h1Q14AQK2U1GSRPt26tky8z"]},"src/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0xca78a771025442e0f2c3b56f6e5c0a4b37a797a83eb9e6ff1ad30bdc9504b6cc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://416d2272ec70a69a63ae15d36c4ab3272f0bc201d8100af112f3d7085a505015","dweb:/ipfs/QmafRa5U9GyL5LvcKSPd2BL7kRFS2DsB9vfqHzc5ztkWvG"]},"src/IERC721.sol":{"keccak256":"0x27f67e429c62c7be0ae67e57ee9e17f291b2641f2bbe2343afbc8683eec0259c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://91e0900eeb3839247e5fe2bf2cdfd931f69ef4d55b0ad942b6c81ebcb9ebbbfd","dweb:/ipfs/QmfGtU4NhKurQ69EhyiAx3iHMHFz6EgX9JR9LQ2EuPS25j"]},"src/ISTBL_YLD.sol":{"keccak256":"0xedf3165203cd7ca56cc528b95b8ee2a22ea4fb979d397f1f6264c1e3fa241817","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d4fe5619cebb079e4115d799ca768f047714ed1baa961c03c216d65396f6f386","dweb:/ipfs/QmTKAN8va3sw8WYumkemWX76LkensXhrL1jDMTj33e765J"]},"src/STBL_Structs.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd66a3ed2981010f0bb45299452dbc0393c5ea58f5b50000f0e4e110b6192fbbf","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://483a4baae27584118210c6714cb2381fbdc09772b37c5d1d51dd9c833d00e2fb","dweb:/ipfs/QmUmmqjnZ9h7Y5idUUfEu4HYYapYa1j1v7p9vVhB2yGWgD"]}},"version":1}

approve(address,uint256).details: Gives permission to `to` to transfer `tokenId` token to another account. The approval is cleared when the token is transferred. Only a single account can be approved at a time, so approving the zero address clears previous approvals. Requirements: - The caller must own the token or be an approved operator. - `tokenId` must exist. Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of tokens in ``owner``'s account.

burn(address,uint256).custom:security: Validates ownership and token existence before burning
burn(address,uint256).details: Only callable by BURNER_ROLE. Decrements total supply

params._from: Current owner address of the NFT

disableNFT(uint256).custom:security: Used for compliance or security concerns
disableNFT(uint256).details: Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE. NFT remains owned but non-transferable

enableNFT(uint256).custom:security: Allows restoration of NFT after issues are resolved
enableNFT(uint256).details: Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE. Restores full NFT functionality

getApproved(uint256).details: Returns the account approved for `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

getNFTData(uint256).custom:view-function: Pure read operation with no state changes
getNFTData(uint256).details: Reverts with NonexistentToken if tokenID does not exist

params._tokenID: Token ID to query metadata for

returns._0: YLD_Metadata struct containing all token data

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {AccessControl-_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns if the `operator` is allowed to manage all of the assets of `owner`. See {setApprovalForAll}

mint(address,(uint256,string,uint256,uin.custom:security: Validates recipient address and metadata integrity
mint(address,(uint256,string,uint256,uin.details: Only callable by MINTER_ROLE. Increments total supply

params._metadata: Complete metadata structure for the NFT
params._to: Recipient address for the new NFT

returns._0: Token ID of the newly minted NFT

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of the `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

pause().custom:security: Emergency function to halt all operations
pause().details: Only callable by PAUSER_ROLE. Prevents transfers, minting, and burning

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`, checking first that contract recipients are aware of the ERC-721 protocol to prevent tokens from being forever locked. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must have been allowed to move this token by either {approve} or   {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {transferFrom} or {safeTransferFrom} for any token owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the address zero. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.

setBaseURI(string).details: Changes the base URI used for constructing token metadata URLsOnly callable by addresses with DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE

params._uri: The new base URI to set for token metadata

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. WARNING: Note that the caller is responsible to confirm that the recipient is capable of receiving ERC-721 or else they may be permanently lost. Usage of {safeTransferFrom} prevents loss, though the caller must understand this adds an external call which potentially creates a reentrancy vulnerability. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. Emits a {Transfer} event.

unpause().custom:security: Should only be called after emergency conditions are resolved
unpause().details: Only callable by PAUSER_ROLE. Restores normal operations after pause

disableNFT(uint256).notice: Disables an NFT, preventing transfers and usage

getNFTData(uint256).notice: Retrieves complete metadata for a specific NFT

mint(address,(uint256,string,uint256,uin.notice: Creates a new NFT with specified metadata

setBaseURI(string).notice: Updates the base URI for token metadata
